meanings.definition: The quality or state of having a foul odor.
meanings.sent1: The malodorousness of the garbage dump was overwhelming, causing many to cover their noses.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the malodorousness of the sewage leak in the basement any longer.
meanings.sent3: The malodorousness of the situation was so bad that even the dog refused to enter the room.
meanings.sent4: The malodorousness of the fish market hit them like a wave as soon as they stepped inside.
meanings.sent5: The malodorousness of the swamp was a constant reminder of the need to protect the environment.
